movie.title: Isoroku Yamamoto, the Commander-in-Chief of the Combined Fleet
movie.plot: The life of Admiral Isoroku Yamamoto from the early 1930's to his death at the hands of the US military in 1943.

events.title: Isoroku Yamamoto is shot down and killed by an American plane
